meanings.definition: Not suspected or thought of; not believed to be guilty or responsible.
meanings.sent1: The treasure was hidden in an unsuspected location.
meanings.sent2: The detective found an unsuspected clue that led to the real culprit.
meanings.sent3: It was an unsuspected twist in the plot that left everyone shocked.
meanings.sent4: Her unsuspected talent for painting emerged during the art class.
meanings.sent5: The unsuspected truth finally came to light, revealing the real story.

meanings.definition: Not expected or anticipated; surprising or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The storm brought an unsuspected amount of rain, causing flooding.
meanings.sent2: The unsuspected arrival of the guests caught her off guard.
meanings.sent3: His unsuspected sense of humor made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The unsuspected beauty of the sunset took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The unsuspected news of their engagement spread joy among their friends.
